name: HydroBlok®
description: HydroBlok® sealer is a waterborne, non-flammable, silicate penetrating solution it is specifically designed as a concrete sealer/densifier for stopping moisture migration or major seepage of blocks, concrete decks slabs, walls, driveways, foundations or old porous concrete. HydroBlok® is produced specifically for sealing heavyweight CMU (concrete masonry units). This is a user friendly product that will seal CMU structures under the most difficult conditions and leave the concrete blocks paint-able if desired. This spray on product is designed for new or old heavyweight CMU structures and will seal your blocks easily and effectively.
